oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup - 1947-01-30 - KOMA - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part one of a performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on January 30, 1947 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Cimarron Kids; Hiram Higsby; Mary Lou; Dick Reinhart
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Opening statements and theme / (1:47) Hiram Higsby introduces the next song / (2:03) Chuck Davis performs "Polly Wolly Doodle" / (3:37) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tells a joke / (4:22) The Cimarron Kids perform "Down By The River Side" / (6:32) Hiram Higsby introduces the next song / (6:44) Hiram Higsby performs "The Band Played On" / (9:00) Hiram Higsby introduces the next song / (9:09) Mary Lou performs "Swing Time Cowgirl" / (10:45) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (11:17) Dick Reinhart performs "Rock Me To Sleep In My Saddle" / (13:46) Chuck Davis performs "[Unidentified tune]" [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; CBS Inc.; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); Davis, Chuck; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975; Reinhart, Dick;
